name: Cop Bus Demolition
description:
Will you become the next Demolition Derby champion? Drive and smash your way to demolition victory!
It’s time to take your cop bus towards the off road and compete in one of the deadliest demolition game.

Features:
• Easy controllers
• Realistic bus driving experience
• Good graphics
• Realistic physics
• Exciting bus demolition gameplay levels.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
